metadata.name: Super Geisha #1
metadata.description:
This is your social kit: It contains your Super Geisha PFP + a Kaiju Battle Banner with your unique hero in action + a pixelated version of that same Geisha. Fully rendered and rigged 3D models are coming soon!

Download Super Geisha: https://nftstorage.link/ipfs/bafybeia7r5wouh3cfsrbg6m5jin46qrl4guipwmrouujj3krd3hwdjmhca/1.png

Download Battle Banner: https://nftstorage.link/ipfs/bafybeidwfhuf4q2hnwkndjvyobhf7epvweylhl36ocv775vva4oscmjx5q/1.png

Pixel Spite Sheet download available soon at: https://www.supergeisha.io/

Uncontrollable, chaotic, diverse, but friendly giant beings have arrived on Earth from GeishaLand, ready to defend humanity from the fearsome Kaiju! Super Geisha is a collection featuring 6776 unique characters and banners algorithmically generated using over 210 hand-drawn traits.
